alert.note: Alert for Hemphill; Lipscomb; Ochiltree; Roberts (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 5:43PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Lipscomb, Roberts, western Hemphill and southern Ochiltree Counties through 615 PM CDT... At 542 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 14 miles southwest of Wolf Creek Park, or 21 miles south of Perryton, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Canadian, Miami, Wolf Creek Park, Glazier and Lora. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
